main event: Numerous witnesses observed a silvery object that appeared to split into three or four objects while moving rapidly for approximately 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object flashed and was bright silver in color., The witnesses described the object moving side-to-side and up and down., The sighting lasted for about 45 minutes with physical evidence available., The document was part of a Project Blue Book report., The object seemed to disappear completely in less than 5 seconds with no trail or bright flash.
sighted object: a silvery object that split into multiple objects
witness description: Various individuals, including an Air Force officer, observed the object.
